field.label: When send the order confirmation e-mail
Default selected method
field.comment: This method will be preselected when available

field.label: Use base currency?
field.comment: When set to Yes, the base currency will be used for the transaction request, else the store view currency will be active

field.label: Tokenization
field.comment: Select whether or not tokenization should be available.

field.label: Create Payment link
field.comment: Create a payment link for manually created orders

field.label: Reset Gateway
field.comment: Reset the payment link gateway. The selected payment method will not be used when creating a payment link for an order created within the Magento backend

field.label: Keep cart alive
field.comment: This will restore the cart when processing the transaction. When a consumer uses the back button, the cart won't be empty.

field.label: Enable debug mode
field.comment: All API request will be stored within var/log/multisafepay.log

field.label: Exclude custom totals
field.comment: Fill in the custom total code(s) that shouldn't be visible on the MultiSafepay payment page. Semicolon (;) separated values.

field.label: Maximum Order Total
field.comment: Leave empty to disable limit

field.label: Seconds active
field.comment: Days active will not be used when seconds active is configured

field.comment: Leave empty to disable limit

field.label: Bank Transfer New Order Status
field.comment: This will override the New Order Status in the MultiSafepay Settings

field.label: Send account e-mail
field.comment: Send the new account email when a customer account is created after using Fastcheckout

field.label: Force accept agreements
field.comment: If enabled the customer must accept the terms and conditions in the fast checkout process

field.label: Alternate Agreements URL
field.comment: Leave this empty for the standard URL for the agreements
